mapper.select: SELECT t.userId, u.name as userName, COUNT(*) as taskCount, CONCAT(FORMAT(COUNT(*) * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE projectId = #{projectId}), 1)) as taskPercentage, SUM(CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(t.realEnd, '%Y-%m-%d') > STR_TO_DATE(t.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as lateTaskCount, CONCAT(FORMAT(SUM(CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(t.realEnd, '%Y-%m-%d') > STR_TO_DATE(t.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100 / COUNT(*), 1), '%') as lateTaskPercentage, SUM(CASE WHEN t.modify > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as modifiedTaskCount, CONCAT(FORMAT(SUM(CASE WHEN t.modify > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100 / COUNT(*),0 ), '%') as modifiedTaskPercentage, SUM(CASE WHEN t.issue > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as issueTaskCount, CONCAT(FORMAT(SUM(CASE WHEN t.issue > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100 / COUNT(*), 1), '%') as issueTaskPercentage, SUM(CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(t.realEnd, '%Y-%m-%d') > STR_TO_DATE(t.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.issue = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as nonIssueLateTaskCount, GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN STR_TO_DATE(t.realEnd, '%Y-%m-%d') > STR_TO_DATE(t.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AND t.issue = 0 THEN t.detail END SEPARATOR ', ') as nonIssueLateTaskDetail FROM task t INNER JOIN user u ON t.userId = u.id WHERE t.projectId = #{projectId} GROUP BY t.userId;
